title: Video: Gleemer – Bedroom
content:
With each and every song Gleemer puts out into the world, he’s gradually building upon his fanbase and also strengthening his sound.

This fitting video encapsulates much of Gleemer’s aesthetic; lo-fi recording combined with a youthful exuberance. Bedroom may well be Gleemer’s most complete track to date, drawing from his debut release Death Sky, Soft Eye, whilst dealing with darker themes than we’re used to from Corey Coffman. Check out the Jack Garland directed video below.
